features: Slim fit sits close to the body, with room for the garment to move with you; Stretch fabrication
Dryride two-layer fabric[10,000mm/10,000g]is highly breathable, waterproof, and quick drying
Fully-taped seams create the ultimate seal against foul weather
Living Lining® provides consistent temperature regulation without adding bulk or weight
Mapped with embossed taffeta and small-hole mesh for added breathability and warmth
Back pockets with hook-and-loop closure, zippered microfleece hand-warmer pockets, and zippered thigh pocket
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
